name: My Friend Matisse
description:
#GlitchJam

WARNING: THIS GAME HAS FLASHING LIGHTS AS WELL AS OTHER THINGS

I h̵av͟e à frie͞nd ҉n̶am҉ed ͏Matis̴se ẃho͠ deserves a̕ ̴ga҉me ̨t͢o be̵ ́ma͘de ͜of ḩím, ͢s̷ơ ͞ I m̨a̢ḑe ҉i̧t. Its a game about what it is to be a c̡oo͞l k҉id͘,̶ a͢nd be͢i̷n̷g ̀hap͝p̷y at a̶ll ͏c͡os̀ts͠.

Controls: ARROW KEYS OR WASD OR GAMEPAD

BTW that chiptune song in the levels is by Starship Amazing which you should all listen to.
